comments.content:
Thanks Michael.  This is a simple one so I'll do it   
Tests passed (actually one or two failed but weren't reproducible), and "ant precommit" passed so I'll commit to 7.x to eventually be in 7.1.  If 7.0 is held up any further then we might bump this up to 7.0.
comments.author: David Smiley
